column5: Clean Beautiful and Bright place to stay for July and August!  Great location 22 minutes from Downtown Austin, 11 minutes to Downtown Round Rock  Excellent shopping, dining, entertainment, and parks and playgrounds all in a local area.  Furnished with beds, rocking chair, sofa, kitchen utensils, dishwasher, dining room table and chairs, etc. Updated with granite counter tops in kitchen and bathroom. Carpet, rugs, and tile floors
